document_data.name: ''Arrow of Petrification''
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Arrows of petrification''''' were [[enchanted]] [[arrow]]s that could turn their targets to stone.

{{quote|''Always like to to give 'em a taste of their own medicine.''|[[Bliney Granter]], [[basilisk]] hunter.}}
document_data.Powers: Upon impact, ''arrows of petrification'' acted as a powerful version of the ''[[flesh to stone]]'' spell, [[Petrification|petrifying]] creatures vulnerable to such magics.
document_data.History: These enchanted arrows were famously wielded by Bliney Granter, a renowned basilisk hunter. He shot the missiles at his prey to either slow them down or petrify them, then finishing them up close with the ''[[Shattermaster]]'', his enchanted [[hammer]]. Bliney Granter's career ended ironically, when he accidentally pricked his finger on an ''arrow of petrification''. His petrified remains were later proudly displayed in the Granter widow's manor courtyard.
